messages.title: Dear Thomas,
messages.content: As your Conservative candidate for Southampton Test I am writing today to share my plan for our area and how we can make our city better together.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A strong economy to deliver more employment and highly-skilled jobs. Ensures local people have the opportunity to buy a home, get on and succeed in life.
Utilize the European Union negotiation advantages for our city to forge its own future.
Ensure that everyone in Southampton has the opportunity to make the most of their talents and get the rewards for their efforts.
A strong economy is the only way we can afford high quality public services. More doctors and more nurses in our hospitals, and better care for you and your family.
As your Conservative Member of Parliament, I'll ensure that Southampton gets the very best deal from Government.

issues.economy: A strong national and local economy
issues.health: More doctors and more nurses in our hospitals, and better care for you and your family.

housing.content: Ensures local people have the opportunity to buy a home, get on and succeed in life.

images.caption: Paul Holmes standing with Theresa May in Southampton Test
